content: this pattern is for a heart gnome christmas ornament finished size about 5″ free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-gnome-pattern-christmas-ornament/ video tutorial https //youtu be/4s6bdusieck si=d8afsxynltzzh_tq by purchasing this listing you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format
